00067   template<>
00068   struct graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph> {
00069   private:
00070     // Helpers :
00071     typedef TREX::transaction::graph graph_type;
00072 
00073   public:
00074     // Graph concept
00080     typedef graph_type::reactor_id        vertex_descriptor;
00087     typedef graph_type::relation_type     edge_descriptor;
00088 
00093     typedef graph_type::directed_category      directed_category;
00104     typedef graph_type::edge_parallel_category edge_parallel_category;
00109     typedef graph_type::traversal_category     traversal_category;
00110 
00119     static inline vertex_descriptor null_vertex() {
00120       return graph_type::null_reactor();
00121     }
00122 
00123     // Incidence Graph Concept
00131     typedef TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator  out_edge_iterator;
00136     typedef TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::size_type          degree_size_type;
00137 
00138     // Adjacency Graph Concept
00147     typedef boost::adjacency_iterator<graph_type, vertex_descriptor,
00148                                   out_edge_iterator, 
00149                                   graph_type::difference_type> adjacency_iterator;
00150     // vertex List graph Concept
00155     typedef graph_type::reactor_iterator     vertex_iterator;
00160     typedef graph_type::size_type            vertices_size_type;
00161 
00162     // edge List graph Concept
00169     typedef graph_type::edge_iterator     edge_iterator;
00174     typedef graph_type::size_type         edges_size_type;
00175   }; // boost::graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>
00176 
00177   /*
00178    * Incidence Graph Concept
00179    */
00195   inline std::pair< TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator, 
00196                   TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator >
00197   out_edges(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00198            TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00199     return std::make_pair(r->ext_begin(), r->ext_end());
00200   }
00201   
00218   inline TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id
00219   source(TREX::transaction::graph::relation_type const &rel,
00220         TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00221     return &(rel.client());
00222   }
00223 
00243   inline TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id
00244   target(TREX::transaction::graph::relation_type const &rel,
00245         TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00246     if( rel.active() )
00247       return &(rel.server());
00248     return TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor();
00249   }
00250 
00267   inline TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::size_type 
00268   out_degree(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00269             TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00270     return TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor()==r?0:r->count_externals();
00271   }
00272   
00273   /*
00274    * Adjacency graph concept 
00275    */
00276 
00291   inline std::pair< graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator,
00292                   graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator >
00293   adjacent_vertices(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00294                   TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00295     std::pair< TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator, 
00296               TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator >
00297       tmp = out_edges(r, g);
00298     return std::make_pair
00299       (graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator(tmp.first, &g),
00300        graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator(tmp.second, &g));
00301   }
00302 
00303   /*
00304    * Vertex List Graph Concept
00305    */
00319   inline std::pair<TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_iterator,
00320                  TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_iterator>
00321   vertices(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00322     return std::make_pair(g.reactor_begin(), g.reactor_end());
00323   }
00324 
00339   inline TREX::transaction::graph::size_type
00340   num_vertices(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00341     return g.count_reactors();
00342   }
00343 
00344   /*
00345    * Edge List Graph Concept
00346    */
00347   inline std::pair< TREX::transaction::graph::edge_iterator,
00348                   TREX::transaction::graph::edge_iterator >
00349   edges(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00350     return std::make_pair(g.relation_begin(), g.relation_end());
00351   }
00352 
00353   inline TREX::transaction::graph::size_type
00354   num_edges(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00355     return g.count_relations();
00356   }

00378       struct graph_edge_name_map 
00379        :public boost::put_get_helper<TREX::utils::Symbol, 
00380                                   graph_edge_name_map> {
00381 
00382        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00383        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol              value_type;
00384        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol const &      reference;
00385        typedef graph::relation_type             key_type;
00386 
00395        reference operator[](key_type const &rel) const {
00396          return rel.name();
00397        }
00398       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_edge_name_map
00399 
00413       struct graph_vertex_name_map 
00414        :public boost::put_get_helper<TREX::utils::Symbol, 
00415                                   graph_vertex_name_map> {
00416 
00417        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00418        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol              value_type;
00419        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol const &      reference;
00420        typedef graph::reactor_id                key_type;
00421 
00432        reference operator[](key_type r) const {
00433          static TREX::utils::Symbol const null_name;
00434 
00435          if( graph::null_reactor()==r )
00436            return null_name;
00437          else
00438            return r->getName();
00439        }
00440       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_vertex_name_map
00441       
00455       struct graph_vertex_id_map
00456        :public boost::put_get_helper<long, 
00457                                   graph_vertex_id_map> {
00458       public:
00459        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00460        typedef long                             value_type;
00461        typedef long                             reference;
00462        typedef graph::reactor_id                key_type;
00463 
00470        graph_vertex_id_map(graph const &g)
00471          :m_g(&g) {}
00472        
00481        value_type operator[](key_type r) const {
00482          return m_g->index(r);
00483        }
00484       private:
00485        graph const *m_g;
00486 
00487       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_vertex_id_map
00488       
00489     } // TREX::transaction::details    
00490     
00500     class graph_names_writer {
00501     public:
00503       graph_names_writer() {}
00504       
00513       void operator()(std::ostream &out, graph::reactor_id r) const {
00514        if( graph::null_reactor()!=r )
00515          label(out, r->getName()); 
00516       }
00525       void operator()(std::ostream &out, graph::relation_type const &rel) const {
00526        if( rel->active() ) {
00527          out<<"[label=\""<<rel->name();
00528          if( rel->accept_goals() )
00529            out<<'['<<rel->latency()<<':'<<rel->look_ahead()<<"]\" color=\"blue";
00530          out<<"\"]";
00531        } else 
00532          // display inactive relation in red
00533          out<<"[label=\""<<rel->name()<<"\" color=\"red\"]";
00534       }
00535 
00536     private:
00545       void label(std::ostream &out, TREX::utils::Symbol const &name) const {
00546        out<<"[label=\""<<name<<"\"]";
00547       }       
00548     };
00549 
00550   } // TREX::transaction
00551 } // TREX
